abstract: Under a deal to be announced Wednesday, Ocean Spray will build cranberry bog displays at Disney attractions like Epcot and Disney will sell Craisins at its theme parks, cruise ships and hotels.
snippet: Under a deal to be announced Wednesday, Ocean Spray will build cranberry bog displays at Disney attractions like Epcot and Disney will sell Craisins at its theme parks, cruise ships and hotels.
lead_paragraph: Ocean Spray and the Disney parks and resorts unit of the Walt Disney Company are to announce on Wednesday morning a multiyear promotional and marketing partnership. Financial terms are not being disclosed.

headline.main: Ocean Spray and Disney Strike a Deal
